text.speaker: narrator
text.message: You and your two other friend, race through the forest, making it to the Fields of Valour in record time.

text.speaker: narrator
text.message:
Up ahead, you see and old man in a silvery cloak talking to an elegant looking lady dressed in black.
As you walk closer, you happen to hear some of their conversation...

text.speaker: Old man
text.message: Your Majesty, did you manage to solve the puzzle yet?

text.speaker: Lady in black
text.message: Oh no, it's black to move. I do believe I should get going...

text.speaker: narrator
text.message: The old man shuffles after her, noticing his action, the lady quickly points to you.

text.speaker: Lady in black
text.message: I'm sure you could convince this young lad to play with you in my stead. He looks like he'd love a puzzle.
Old man: Well, young lad, what's the solution?

partials.c0fcb20c01825c8cbe1d66b58bc7b8e2aa88e9ec: Young ones nowadays, don't wanna put in the work

text.answer_response: Oh yes, Audinos! They are my favourite pokemon, especially the babies are so adorable...

text.speaker: Old man
text.message: I have about 20 more than I should, would you like one?
You asked for it! Don't cry if it's too hard for you.

partials.c0fcb20c01825c8cbe1d66b58bc7b8e2aa88e9ec: Am I the one with memory loss or are you?

text.speaker: Old man
text.message: So what species of Pokemon would you like?

text.speaker: Old man
text.message: Thanks for entertaining me, by the looks of that map you're headed to the dragon's castle. Best of luck!

text.speaker: narrator
text.message: Waving goodbye to the old man, you walk up the mountain-side towards the treasure.
